item.title: 中国将刺激内需，2024年经济复苏——官方媒体
item.description:
China will spur domestic demand and consolidate and enhance the economic recovery in 2024, the Politburo, a top decision-making body of the ruling Communist Party, was quoted by state media as saying on Friday.翻译:官方媒体周五援引中共最高决策机构政治局的话说，到2024年，中国将刺激内需，巩固和提升经济复苏。

China will continue to implement a prudent monetary policy and proactive fiscal policy in 2024, state media reported the Politburo as saying.翻译:据官方媒体报道，政治局表示，2024年中国将继续实施稳健的货币政策和积极的财政政策。

The meeting, which was chaired by President Xi Jinping, also said the country will enhance the consistency of macroeconomic policies, the official Xinhua news agency reported.翻译:据官方新华社报道，这次由国家主席习近平主持的会议还表示，国家将增强宏观经济政策的一致性。

China will "effectively enhance economic vitality, prevent and resolve risks, improve social expectations, consolidate and enhance the positive trend of economic recovery, continue to promote the effective improvement of quality and reasonable growth of the economy," Xinhua said.翻译:新华社表示，中国将“切实增强经济活力，防范化解风险，改善社会预期，巩固和增强经济回升向好的势头，继续推动经济质量有效提升、合理增长”。

“Efforts should be made to expand domestic demand and form a virtuous cycle of mutually promoting consumption and investment. We need to deepen reforms in key areas and continuously inject strong impetus into high-quality development.”翻译:“要努力扩大内需，形成消费和投资相互促进的良性循环。我们要深化重点领域改革，不断为高质量发展注入强劲动力。”

Most analysts believe China's growth is on track to hit the government's target of around 5% this year, but that compares with a COVID-weakened 2022 and the activity remains uneven.翻译:大多数分析师认为，中国今年的经济增长有望达到政府设定的 5% 左右的目标，但与受新冠疫情影响而减弱的 2022 年相比，经济活动仍然不平衡。

China's government advisers will recommend a steady growth target for 2024 and more stimulus to the policymakers' meeting.翻译:中国政府顾问将向政策制定者会议推荐2024年稳定增长目标和更多刺激措施。

The government has launched a slew of policy measures in recent months to shore up a feeble post-pandemic economic recovery impacted by a property crisis, local government debt risks, slow global growth and geopolitical tensions.翻译:近几个月来，政府推出了一系列政策措施，以支撑受房地产危机、地方政府债务风险、全球经济增长放缓和地缘政治紧张局势影响的疫情后疲软的经济复苏。

The central bank has delivered modest interest rate cuts and pumped out more cash in recent months to support growth.翻译:近几个月来，央行适度降息并注入更多现金以支持经济增长。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($139.84 billion) in sovereign bonds by the end of the year, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of gross domestic product (GDP) from the original 3%.翻译:10月，中国公布了在年底前发行1万亿元人民币（1,398.4亿美元）主权债券的计划，将2023年预算赤字目标从原来占国内生产总值（GDP）的3%提高到3.8%。

The Politburo also studied plans for anti-corruption work and reviewed regulations on party disciplinary action, Xinhua said.翻译:新华社称，政治局还研究了反腐败工作方案，并审查了党纪处分规定。

The politburo's meeting on economic work is usually a prelude to the annual agenda-setting Central Economic Work Conference, which is expected to be held around mid-December.翻译:政治局经济工作会议通常是一年一度的中央经济工作会议的前奏，该会议预计将于 12 月中旬召开。

(This story has been corrected to fix the year to 2024 from 2014 in paragraph 1)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，将第 1 段中的年份从 2014 年固定为 2024 年）

Reporting by Beijing newsroom and Kevin Yao; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Edmund Klamann翻译:北京新闻编辑室、姚凯文报道；克里斯托弗·库欣和埃德蒙·克拉曼编辑

item.title: 第五点：圣诞怪杰还是圣诞老人——会是哪一个美联储？
item.description:
The last big central bank push of the year is here with the Fed, the ECB and the Bank of England among the big hitters meeting while markets try to discern if a U.S. recession is unavoidable or a distant prospect.翻译:今年央行的最后一次重大举措即将到来，美联储、欧洲央行和英国央行等重要人士将召开会议，而市场则试图判断美国经济衰退是否不可避免或前景遥远。

China's policymakers will set direction for next year while Bitcoin enjoys a stellar rally.翻译:在比特币大幅上涨的同时，中国的政策制定者将为明年制定方向。

Here's your week ahead in financial markets from Lewis Krauskopf in New York, Kevin Buckland in Tokyo, Yoruk Bahceli in Amsterdam, and Naomi Rovnick and Elizabeth Howcroft in London.

1/ FED FIRST

There's no bigger factor than the Fed for markets in their bets on when rate cuts might come, with policy makers getting one last chance this year to roil markets when the world's top central bank gives its final 2023 policy statement on Wednesday.翻译:对于市场押注何时降息，没有比美联储更重要的因素了，全球最高央行周三将发布 2023 年最终政策声明，政策制定者将获得今年最后一次扰乱市场的机会。

Holding rates seems a done deal, with investors laser focused on comments from Chair Jerome Powell that could indicate when the Fed might look to cut rates after 525 basis points of hikes since March 2022.翻译:维持利率似乎已成定局，投资者高度关注主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的言论，这些言论可能表明美联储在自 2022 年 3 月以来加息 525 个基点后可能会考虑何时降息。

Projections the Fed is poised to start lowering rates early in 2024 have helped fuel that huge rally in stocks and bonds, sending the S&P 500 to a new closing high for 2023 and pulling 10-year Treasury yields back down closer to 4%.翻译:美联储准备在 2024 年初开始降息的预测推动了股票和债券的大幅上涨，推动标准普尔 500 指数在 2023 年创下收盘新高，并将 10 年期国债收益率拉低至接近 4%。

U.S. November inflation data on Tuesday could provide a wrinkle for markets. October's consumer price index reading was unchanged, a first in more than a year.

2/ AND THEN THE REST

It is not just in the U.S. that traders have ignored policymaker warnings that bets on steep rate cuts next year have gone overboard.翻译:不仅仅是在美国，交易员们忽视了政策制定者的警告，即对明年大幅降息的押注已经过头了。

Major central banks elsewhere are on the jam packed agenda with the Swiss National Bank, Norges Bank, Bank of England and European Central Bank all meeting Thursday. All but Norway are tipped to stay on hold.翻译:其他地区的主要央行都在繁忙的议程中，瑞士央行、挪威央行、英格兰银行和欧洲央行均于周四召开会议。除挪威外，所有国家都预计将按兵不动。

With markets pricing five Fed and six ECB cuts next year, focus is on how policymakers, who can't sound the all-clear on inflation just yet, grapple with the pressure.翻译:由于市场预计明年美联储将降息五次，欧洲央行将降息六次，因此焦点在于政策制定者如何应对压力，他们目前还无法明确通胀目标。

Comments from rates-setters, such as ECB hawk Isabel Schnabel, have prompted traders to double down, and they are likely to pounce on any clues central bankers are starting to come around. But if policymakers decide enough is enough and challenge markets, expect a broad sell-off.

3/ HIGH STAKES

Recession roulette has been a high-stakes game since late 2021 and it's not getting easier. Forecasters at top investment banks are deeply divided between those sticking to predictions of a long-expected U.S. downturn and rapid Federal Reserve rate cuts and others recommending folding on the bet.翻译:自 2021 年底以来，经济衰退轮盘赌一直是一场高风险的游戏，而且它并没有变得更容易。顶级投行的预测员们意见分歧很大，一些人坚持长期预期的美国经济衰退和美联储快速降息的预测，另一些人则建议放弃这一赌注。

Goldman Sachs expects the world's largest economy to decelerate without contracting, with borrowing costs staying near current levels. Deutsche Bank predicts a mild recession followed by a whopping 175 basis points of cuts that will drive the S&P 500 (.SPX) about 10% higher by late 2024. Uncertainty seems to rise despite November's red-hot rally for stocks and bonds. PMI readings due out in days to come will provide a frontline view.翻译:高盛预计，全球最大经济体将在不收缩的情况下减速，借贷成本将保持在当前水平附近。德意志银行预测，经济将出现温和衰退，随后将大幅降息 175 个基点，这将推动标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)到 2024 年末上涨约 10%。尽管 11 月份股票和债券大幅上涨，但不确定性似乎仍在增加。未来几天公布的 PMI 读数将提供前线观点。

Outflows from equity and bond funds show investors - currently well compensated for holding cash - are stepping away from the table. Citi's risk aversion is ticking higher.

4/ ANIMAL SPIRITS

China's economy is sending mixed signals about its health, just as policy makers convene for pivotal closed-door meetings to set the 2024 agenda. Government advisers have told Reuters they'll recommend a repeat of the 5% growth target, but also more stimulus in order to get there.翻译:就在政策制定者召开关键闭门会议制定 2024 年议程之际，中国经济正在发出有关其健康状况的复杂信号。政府顾问告诉路透社，他们将建议重复 5% 的增长目标，但也建议采取更多刺激措施以实现这一目标。

Measures so far, have for the most part fallen short, with confidence fragile among consumers and factory managers. Beijing needs a return of animal spirits to fill the hole left by patchy property market growth.翻译:到目前为止，措施大部分都不够有效，消费者和工厂管理者的信心脆弱。北京需要恢复动物精神，以填补房地产市场增长不平衡留下的缺口。

Retail sales data on Dec. 15 will provide an update, after figures out in recent days showed a surprise contraction for imports - suggesting subdued domestic demand - even as exports unexpectedly rebounded.翻译:12月15日的零售销售数据将提供最新数据，此前几天的数据显示，尽管出口意外反弹，但进口意外收缩——表明国内需求疲软。

Real estate remains the elephant in the room though, and was at the heart of a Moody's decision to cut the outlook for China's debt rating - a move reverberating through Chinese capital markets all week.

5/ BACK TO 2022

Bitcoin has been rising again. On Tuesday it hit $44,490 - its highest since April last year . In other words, it's back to levels it was at before 2022's most high-profile crypto firm collapses: TerraUSD, Three Arrows Capital, Celsius and FTX.翻译:比特币再次上涨。周二，该价格触及 44,490 美元——去年 4 月以来的最高水平。换句话说，它回到了 2022 年最受瞩目的加密货币公司倒闭之前的水平： TerraUSD 、 三箭资本、 摄氏度和FTX 。

The gains are fuelled by hopes that the U.S. might approve applications for a spot bitcoin ETF, analysts say, as well as investors betting on Fed rate cuts next year.翻译:分析师表示，美国可能批准现货比特币 ETF 申请的希望，以及投资者押注美联储明年降息，推动了比特币上涨。

But those outcomes are far from guaranteed, and JPMorgan has called the bitcoin rally "overdone".翻译:但这些结果远未得到保证，摩根大通称比特币涨势“过度”。

Meanwhile crypto fans don't appear worried about the U.S. Treasury warning about consequences for the industry if firms fail to block and report the flow of illicit funds.翻译:与此同时，加密货币爱好者似乎并不担心美国财政部警告称，如果公司未能阻止并报告非法资金流动，该行业将面临后果。

item.title: 台湾在即将上任的总统领导下对与危地马拉的正式关系“放心”
item.description:
Taiwan's foreign minister on Friday said Guatemala's incoming government had "reassured" that it intends to maintain formal ties with the island, as China gradually whittles away at Taipei's remaining allies.翻译:台湾外交部长周五表示，随着中国逐渐削弱台北剩余的盟友，危地马拉即将上任的政府已“保证”打算与该岛保持正式关系。

Only 13 countries now officially recognise Chinese-claimed Taiwan, most of those in Central America, the Caribbean and the Pacific. New governments are always a nervous moment as they weigh whether to stick with Taiwan or switch diplomatic relations to China.翻译:目前只有13 个国家正式承认中国声称拥有主权的台湾，其中大多数位于中美洲、加勒比海和太平洋地区。新政府在权衡是继续与台湾还是与中国建立外交关系时总是一个紧张的时刻。

Honduras in March ended its decades-long relationship with Taipei in favour of Beijing following the election in late 2021 of Xiomara Castro as president.翻译:2021 年底希奥马拉·卡斯特罗 (Xiomara Castro) 当选总统后， 洪都拉斯于 3 月结束了与台北长达数十年的关系，转而支持北京。

Taiwan Foreign Minister Joseph Wu told reporters on Friday that the island's ambassador in Guatemala, the most populous country in Central America, had spoken with senior people in the incoming administration of President-elect Bernardo Arevalo.翻译:台湾外交部长吴钊燮周五告诉记者，台湾驻中美洲人口最多的国家危地马拉大使已与当选总统贝尔纳多·阿雷瓦洛即将上任的政府高级官员进行了交谈。

"I think we were reassured that they would like the keep the relations with Taiwan, so that should be no problem," Wu said.翻译:“我认为我们得到了保证，他们希望保持与台湾的关系，所以这应该没有问题，”吴说。

Arevalo said on the campaign trail that he would pursue closer trade relations with China if he was elected.翻译:阿雷瓦洛在竞选期间表示，如果当选，他将寻求与中国建立更密切的贸易关系。

Wu said some other countries that had ditched Taiwan for China were disappointed after Beijing had not lived up to its trade and investment promises.翻译:吴说，其他一些放弃台湾而转向中国的国家对北京没有兑现其贸易和投资承诺感到失望。

"From what we have heard from these people, they were all very disappointed. And therefore the incoming team in Guatemala has also heard those kinds of stories about the Chinese promises," he said.翻译:“从我们从这些人那里听到的消息来看，他们都非常失望。因此，危地马拉的即将上任的团队也听到了有关中国承诺的此类故事，”他说。

China's Foreign Ministry dismissed the criticism, saying this would not change the "positive momentum" in China's ties with countries that had ended relations with Taiwan.翻译:中国外交部驳斥了这些批评，称这不会改变中国与与台湾断交的国家关系的“积极势头”。

The United States has watched with concern as China takes away Taiwan's friends in Central America, traditionally Washington's back yard.翻译:美国关切地看着中国夺走台湾在中美洲的朋友，中美洲传统上是华盛顿的后院。

"I think the United States also understands the significance for Taiwan being able to maintain diplomatic relations with those Caribbean and Latin American countries," Wu said.翻译:吴说：“我认为美国也了解台湾能够与加勒比和拉丁美洲国家保持外交关系的重要性。”

Arevalo's anti-corruption platform helped spring him to a shock landslide victory in August elections, but the transition process ahead of him taking office next month has been troubled with accusations that a politicised justice system is trying to stymie the process.翻译:阿雷瓦洛的反腐败政纲帮助他在八月的选举中取得了令人震惊的压倒性胜利，但他下个月上任之前的过渡进程却因政治化司法系统试图阻碍这一进程的指控而陷入困境。

Wu said he hoped the transition would take place peacefully.翻译:吴说，他希望过渡能和平进行。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Additional reporting by Joe Cash in Beijing; Editing by Tom Hogue翻译:本·布兰查德报道； Joe Cash 在北京的补充报道；汤姆·霍格编辑

item.title: 台湾情报机构称中国领导人讨论了干预选举的问题--消息人士
item.description:
Senior Chinese leaders held a meeting in early December to "coordinate" government efforts to sway upcoming elections in Taiwan, according to intelligence gathered on the island, part of a campaign Taiwan officials see as voting interference.翻译:根据岛上收集到的情报，中国高层领导人于 12 月初举行了一次会议，“协调”政府影响台湾即将举行的选举的努力，台湾官员认为这是干预投票的活动的一部分。

Taiwan officials have warned that Beijing is trying to nudge voters toward candidates who seek closer China ties in the Jan. 13 presidential and legislative election, which is happening as China ramps up military and political pressure to try to force the democratically governed island to accept its sovereignty.翻译:台湾官员警告说，北京正试图在 1 月 13 日的总统选举和立法院选举中，将选民推向那些寻求与中国建立更密切关系的候选人，而此次选举的发生正值中国加大军事和政治压力，试图迫使这个民主治理的岛屿接受其立场之际。主权。

The meeting in Beijing was held by the Chinese Communist Party's fourth-ranked leader, Wang Huning, who is also deputy head of Beijing's Central Leading Group for Taiwan Affairs, chaired by President Xi Jinping, according to multiple Taiwan security officials who discussed the matter with reporters.翻译:据多位与台湾讨论此事的台湾安全官员透露，这次在北京举行的会议是由中国共产党第四号领导人王沪宁主持的，他也是由国家主席习近平主持的中央对台工作领导小组副组长。记者。

Senior personnel from agencies including China's Publicity Department, State Security Ministry, Defence Ministry and the Taiwan Affairs Office attended, the Taiwanese security officials said, citing intelligence gathered by Taiwan. Those officials requested anonymity because of the sensitivity of the matter.翻译:台湾安全官员援引台湾收集的情报称，来自中宣部、国家安全部、国防部和台湾事务办公室等机构​​的高级人员出席了会议。由于此事敏感，这些官员要求匿名。

U.S. President Joe Biden asked Xi to respect Taiwan's electoral process last month.翻译:美国总统拜登上个月要求习近平尊重台湾的选举程序。

China's Taiwan Affairs Office did not respond to a request for comment. When commenting on the elections, it has said it respects Taiwan's "social systems".翻译:中国台湾事务办公室没有回应置评请求。在评论选举时，它表示尊重台湾的“社会制度”。

The other Chinese government departments did not respond to requests for comment. The State Security Ministry has no publicly available contact details.翻译:其他中国政府部门没有回应置评请求。国家安全部没有公开的联系方式。

The meeting focused on "ensuring the effectiveness and coordination of various work on the Taiwan elections", according to an internal Taiwanese memo summing up its intelligence on the Chinese meeting.翻译:根据台湾一份总结其有关中国会议情报的内部备忘录，这次会议的重点是“确保台湾选举各项工作的有效性和协调性”。

The meeting concluded that different agencies should "consolidate" their work on Taiwan, with the Publicity Department and a psychological warfare unit under the People's Liberation Army, called "Base 311", running influence campaigns to sway public opinion via news outlets and social media, the memo said.翻译:会议得出的结论是，各机构应“巩固”对台工作，其中宣传部和解放军下属的心理战部队“311基地”，通过新闻媒体和社交媒体开展影响力活动，影响民意。备忘录说。

China's Taiwan Affairs Office and the United Front Work Department were tasked with reaching out outreach programmes that included exchange activities with Taiwan politicians and discounted air tickets for Taiwanese living in China to fly home to vote, it added.翻译:声明补充说，中国台湾事务办公室和统战部的任务是开展外展​​计划，包括与台湾政界人士的交流活动以及为居住在中国的台湾人回国投票提供折扣机票。

The memo said China would continue to "play up the narrative of a 'choice between peace and war'", which posits that if the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) stays in power, a war with China is likely.翻译:备忘录称，中国将继续“宣扬‘和平与战争之间的选择’的说法”，该说法认为，如果执政的民进党继续执政，可能会与中国发生战争。

Beijing has repeatedly called the DPP dangerous separatists and urged Taiwanese to make the "right choice". The DPP's presidential candidate, Lai Ching-te, is leading in the polls.翻译:北京多次称民进党是危险的分裂分子，并敦促台湾人做出“正确的选择”。民进党总统候选人赖清德在民调中领先。

Taiwan's government is on high alert for what they see as China's attempts to interfere in the elections by illicitly funding Beijing-friendly candidates using communications apps, group tours or misinformation campaigns, internal security reports reviewed by Reuters show.翻译:路透社看到的内部安全报告显示，台湾政府对中国试图通过通讯应用程序、团体旅游或虚假信息活动非法资助亲北京的候选人来干预选举的行为保持高度警惕。

Beijing has also sponsored cut-price trips to China for hundreds of local Taiwanese politicians ahead of the elections, Reuters has reported, citing sources and documents.翻译:据路透社援引消息人士和文件报道，北京方面还在选举前资助了数百名台湾当地政界人士前往中国大陆的低价旅行。

"They are coordinating their work on Taiwan in the final days to the elections," said one of the sources, a senior official familiar with Taiwan's security planning. "They want the best outcome possible."翻译:其中一位消息人士、熟悉台湾安全规划的高级官员表示，“他们正在选举最后几天协调台湾问题的工作”。 “他们希望得到最好的结果。”

In the meeting, Beijing also concluded that it must "adjust the pace" of their campaigns, that senior official said, pointing to negative reactions in Taiwan after recent Taiwan government scrutiny over the cut-price trips, as well as comments on Chinese state television, which has called the DPP's presidential candidates an "independence double act".翻译:这位高级官员表示，在会议上，北京方面还得出结论，必须“调整他们的竞选步伐”，并指出台湾政府最近对降价旅行进行审查后台湾的负面反应，以及中国国家电视台的评论称民进党总统候选人为“独立双标行为” 。

"If you are too obvious with election interference it could backfire," the source said.翻译:消息人士称：“如果你过于明显地干预选举，可能会适得其反。”

Reporting By Yimou Lee. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:李艺谋报道。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 对廉价中国电动汽车的恐惧促使汽车制造商竞相生产经济型汽车
item.description:
The rise of inexpensive Chinese electric vehicles has upped the pressure on legacy automakers who have turned to suppliers, from battery materials makers to chipmakers, to squeeze out costs and develop affordable EVs quicker than previously planned.翻译:中国廉价电动汽车的崛起加大了传统汽车制造商的压力，这些汽车制造商转向从电池材料制造商到芯片制造商等供应商，以挤出成本并比之前计划更快地开发价格实惠的电动汽车。

"Automakers are really now only turning to affordable vehicles, knowing they've got to or they will lose out to Chinese manufacturers," said Andy Palmer, chairman of UK startup Brill Power, which has developed hardware and software to boost EV battery management system performance.翻译:英国初创公司 Brill Power 董事长安迪·帕尔默 (Andy Palmer) 表示：“汽车制造商现在确实只转向价格实惠的汽车，他们知道自己必须这样做，否则就会输给中国制造商。”该公司开发了硬件和软件来增强电动汽车电池管理系统表现。

Palmer, formerly Aston Martin's CEO, said Brill Power's products could boost EV range by 60% and enable smaller batteries. The battery is an EV's most costly component.翻译:阿斯顿·马丁前首席执行官帕尔默表示，Brill Power 的产品可以将电动汽车的续航里程提高 60%，并实现更小的电池。电池是电动汽车中最昂贵的部件。

Fears of slowing demand because EVs are expensive has increased urgency to reduce costs.翻译:由于电动汽车价格昂贵而导致需求放缓的担忧增加了降低成本的紧迫性。

That urgency can be seen everywhere. Renault (RENA.PA) said last month it plans 40% cost reductions for its EVs to reach price parity with fossil-fuel models.翻译:这种紧迫感随处可见。雷诺(RENA.PA)上个月表示，计划将其电动汽车的成本降低 40%，以达到与化石燃料车型的价格平价。

Stellantis (STLAM.MI) is building a European plant with China's CATL (300750.SZ) to make cheaper LFP batteries and recently unveiled the Citroen electric e-C3 SUV, which starts at 23,300 euros ($24,540).翻译:Stellantis (STLAM.MI)正在与中国宁德时代 (CATL ) (300750.SZ) 合作建设欧洲工厂，生产更便宜的 LFP 电池，并于最近推出了雪铁龙电动 e-C3 SUV，起价 23,300 欧元（24,540 美元）。

Volkswagen (VOWG_p.DE) and Tesla (TSLA.O) are developing 25,000-euro EVs.翻译:大众汽车(VOWG_p.DE)和特斯拉(TSLA.O)正在开发 25,000 欧元的电动汽车。

Vincent Pluvinage, CEO of Palo Alto, California-based OneD Battery Sciences, said that on his recent visits with European automaker customers, every meeting started with the same refrain: "'Reducing costs is now more important than anything else.'"翻译:总部位于加利福尼亚州帕洛阿尔托的 OneD Battery Sciences 首席执行官文森特·普卢维纳奇 (Vincent Pluvinage) 表示，在他最近拜访欧洲汽车制造商客户时，每次会议都以同样的口号开始：“‘降低成本现在比其他任何事情都重要。’”

OneD adds silicon nanowires to graphite EV battery anode material to boost range and cut charging time, saving $281 - nearly 50% - versus using graphite alone for a 100 kilowatt hour (kWh) EV battery.翻译:OneD 在石墨电动汽车电池阳极材料中添加硅纳米线，以提高续航里程并缩短充电时间，与单独使用石墨制造 100 千瓦时 (kWh) 电动汽车电池相比，节省 281 美元（近 50%）。

This can reduce EV battery weight by 20% for the same range, Pluvinage said. General Motors (GM.N) is a OneD investor and customer.翻译:Pluvinage 表示，在相同续航里程下，这可以将电动汽车电池重量减轻 20%。通用汽车(GM.N)是 OneD 投资者和客户。

OneD has developed a manufacturing process on relatively inexpensive machinery used in the solar panel industry, as Pluvinage said automakers dislike complex, costly new processes. OneD's first test plant will open early next year.翻译:OneD 已经在太阳能电池板行业使用的相对便宜的机械上开发了一种制造工艺，正如 Pluvinage 所说，汽车制造商不喜欢复杂、昂贵的新工艺。 OneD 的第一个测试工厂将于明年初开业。

Hodenhagen, Germany-based Veekim has developed an EV motor with magnets using a form of ferrite, or iron powder, instead of rare earths, which five automakers and suppliers are testing for affordable EV projects.翻译:总部位于德国霍登哈根的 Veekim 开发了一种带有磁铁的电动汽车电机，使用铁氧体或铁粉代替稀土，五家汽车制造商和供应商正在测试经济实惠的电动汽车项目。

Legacy automakers want to cut rare earths use because China dominates mining and processing. Veekim CEO Peter Siegle said using cheaper ferrite and low-cost processes - including 3D-printed copper wiring - can cut an EV motor's price by 20%. Motors can cost more than 500 euros.

'ALL ABOUT THE COST'

It is not just startups seeking EV cost reductions.翻译:寻求降低电动汽车成本的不仅仅是初创公司。

Chip maker NXP (NXPI.O) is working with automakers to reduce the amount of electronic control units - or mini-computers - in EVs, which can number between 200 and 300, said Allan McAuslin, director of vehicle control and electrification.翻译:芯片制造商恩智浦(NXPI.O)正在与汽车制造商合作，减少电动汽车中电子控制单元（或微型计算机）的数量，其数量可能在 200 到 300 之间，车辆控制和电气化总监 Allan McAuslin 表示。

Siemens (SIEGn.DE) has developed software simulation called digital twins to halve expensive EV development time.翻译:西门子(SIEGn.DE)开发了称为数字孪生的软件模拟，可将昂贵的电动汽车开发时间缩短一半。

European automakers are reacting to the arrival of lower-cost EVs from China, whose makers are planning even cheaper models.翻译:欧洲汽车制造商正在对来自中国的低成本电动汽车的到来做出反应，中国制造商正在计划推出更便宜的车型。

BYD's (002594.SZ) Dolphin hatchback, for instance, starts in the UK at 26,000 pounds ($33,000), nearly 30% below the starting price for the VW ID.3 hatchback.翻译:例如，比亚迪(002594.SZ)的 Dolphin 掀背车在英国的起价为 26,000 英镑（33,000 美元），比大众 ID.3 掀背车的起价低近 30%。

But U.S. automakers, somewhat protected from Chinese EV imports by subsidies in the Inflation Reduction Act, also seek more affordable EVs.翻译:但美国汽车制造商在某种程度上受到《通货膨胀削减法案》补贴的保护，免受中国电动汽车进口的影响，他们也在寻求更实惠的电动汽车。

GM said it has saved billions partly by developing a more inexpensive battery pack with LFP batteries for its revamped Bolt EV, which will launch in 2025, two years earlier than planned.翻译:通用汽车表示，通过为其改进后的 Bolt EV 开发一种更便宜的磷酸铁锂电池组，该公司已节省了数十亿美元，该电动汽车将于 2025 年推出，比原计划提前了两年。

Ford (F.N) said it will cut costs partly through a 50% increase in "in-sourcing" of parts like batteries and inverters.翻译:福特(FN)表示，将通过增加 50% 的电池和逆变器等零部件“内购”来部分削减成本。

Premium automakers want lower costs for EVs, too.翻译:高端汽车制造商也希望降低电动汽车的成本。

Michigan-based Our Next Energy (ONE) is developing an "Ares" battery pack with cheaper LFP technology that should give automakers the same electric driving range for half the price and a "Gemini" pack for customers including BMW (BMWG.DE) that offers extended range and should cost $75/kWh compared with an average today of $130/kWh, CEO Mujeeb Ijaz said.翻译:总部位于密歇根州的 Our Next Energy (ONE) 正在开发一种采用更便宜的 LFP 技术的“Ares”电池组，该电池组将为汽车制造商以一半的价格提供相同的电动行驶里程，并为包括宝马(BMWG.DE)在内的客户开发“Gemini”电池组，首席执行官 Mujeeb Ijaz 表示，其续航里程更长，成本应该为 75 美元/kWh，而目前的平均成本为 130 美元/kWh。

Suppliers said automakers particularly like less expensive parts that also reduce production costs.翻译:供应商表示，汽车制造商特别喜欢价格便宜的零部件，因为这也能降低生产成本。

San Carlos, California-based CelLink has developed a laminate sheet to replace wire harnesses - labor-intensive to make and install - that can be installed by robots.翻译:总部位于加利福尼亚州圣卡洛斯的 CelLink 开发了一种层压板来替代线束（制造和安装需要大量劳动力），并且可以由机器人安装。

CelLink raised $250 million from investors last year and in May announced a $362 million U.S. government loan for its Texas factory.翻译:CelLink 去年从投资者那里筹集了 2.5 亿美元，并于 5 月宣布为其德克萨斯工厂提供3.62 亿美元的美国政府贷款。

Since opening that plant, said CEO Kevin Coakley, "We've gotten some form of a purchase order from basically every major automaker that's come through there."翻译:首席执行官凯文·科克利 (Kevin Coakley) 表示，自从该工厂开业以来，“我们基本上已经从所有经过该工厂的主要汽车制造商那里收到了某种形式的采购订单。”

Israeli startup Addionics has developed porous, three-dimensional copper and aluminium electrode battery materials that look like sheer silk scarves when held up to the light and use far less material - including 60% less copper.翻译:以色列初创公司 Addionics 开发了多孔三维铜铝电极电池材料，这些材料在光线照射下看起来就像透明的丝巾，而且使用的材料少得多，其中铜含量减少了 60%。

Those electrodes provide faster charging and boost EV range by 30%, CEO Moshiel Biton said. But automakers are more interested in projected savings of up to $7.50 per kWh.翻译:首席执行官 Moshiel Biton 表示，这些电极可提供更快的充电速度，并将电动汽车续航里程提高 30%。但汽车制造商更感兴趣的是预计每千瓦时节省 7.50 美元。

"What we hear from carmakers today is, 'We don't need longer range, we want lower costs,'" Biton said.翻译:“我们今天从汽车制造商那里听到的是，‘我们不需要更长的续航里程，我们想要更低的成本，’”比顿说。

Reporting By Nick Carey in London and Paul Lienert in Detroit Editing by Ben Klayman and Matthew Lewis翻译:尼克·凯里在伦敦报道和保罗·利纳特在底特律报道本·克莱曼和马修·刘易斯编辑

item.title: 选举前一个月，中国战机和气球穿越台湾海峡
item.description:
Taiwan said on Friday that 12 Chinese fighter jets and a suspected weather balloon had crossed the Taiwan Strait's sensitive median line, in a ratcheting up of tensions about a month before the island's presidential election.翻译:台湾周五表示，12 架中国战斗机和一个疑似气象气球飞越了台湾海峡敏感的中线，导致台湾总统选举前大约一个月的紧张局势加剧。

Democratically governed Taiwan, which China claims as its own territory, has complained for the past four years of regular Chinese military patrols and drills near the island.翻译:中国声称台湾是民主统治的台湾，过去四年来，台湾一直抱怨中国在台湾附近定期进行军事巡逻和演习。

Taiwan holds presidential and parliamentary polls on Jan. 13 and campaigning has kicked into high gear with how the next government handles relations with China a major point of contention.翻译:台湾将于 1 月 13 日举行总统大选和立法院选举，竞选活动已进入紧锣密鼓的阶段，下届政府如何处理与中国的关系成为主要争论点。

Taiwan's defence ministry, offering details of Chinese missions on Thursday night, said 12 fighter jets had crossed the median line, that once served as an unofficial barrier between the two sides but which Chinese planes now regularly fly over.翻译:台湾国防部周四晚上提供了中国任务的详细信息，称有 12 架战斗机越过中线，这条线曾经是双方之间的非正式屏障，但现在中国飞机经常飞越中线。

In an unusual addition to its statement, the ministry said that around midday on Thursday it had also detected a Chinese balloon 101 nautical miles (187 km) southwest of the northern Taiwanese city of Keelung, which travelled eastward for about an hour, crossing the strait before disappearing.翻译:在其声明中一个不寻常的补充是，该部门表示，周四中午左右，它还在台湾北部城市基隆西南101海里（187公里）处发现了一个中国气球，该气球向东飞行了大约一个小时，穿过海峡消失之前。

Taiwan Defence Minister Chiu Kuo-cheng told reporters at parliament that their "initial understanding" was it was probably a weather balloon, but felt the ministry had an obligation to report this to be public.翻译:台湾国防部长邱国正在国会告诉记者，他们“最初的理解”是这可能是一个气象气球，但他认为国防部有义务将此事公开报告。

"Otherwise, if after other units or other countries have reported it, everyone will wonder why (we) did not report it. The defence ministry requires all our subordinate units to have a grasp of the enemy situation," he added.翻译:“否则，如果其他单位或其他国家报告后，大家会奇怪为什么（我们）不报告。国防部要求我们所有下属单位掌握敌情。”他补充道。

China's defence ministry did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国国防部没有回应置评请求。

The potential for China to use of balloons for spying became a global issue in February when the United States shot down what it said was a Chinese surveillance balloon but which China said was a civilian craft that accidentally drifted astray.翻译:今年二月，中国利用气球进行间谍活动的可能性成为一个全球性问题，当时美国击落了一个据称是中国侦察气球的气球，但中国称其为意外迷失的民用飞船。

Taiwan is on high alert for Chinese activities, both military and political, ahead of its election, especially what Taipei views as Beijing's efforts to interfere in the ballot to get electors to vote for candidates China may prefer.翻译:台湾在选举前对中国的军事和政治活动保持高度警惕，特别是台北认为北京试图干预投票，让选民投票给中国可能更喜欢的候选人。

Vice President Lai Ching-te and running mate Hsiao Bi-khim from the ruling Democratic Progressive Party are leading in the polls. China views then as separatists and has rebuffed Lai's offers of talks.翻译:执政党民进党的副总统赖清德和竞选伙伴萧美琴在民调中领先。中国将其视为分裂分子，并拒绝了赖清德的会谈提议。

Taiwan Foreign Minister Joseph Wu said on Friday that China's Taiwan Affairs Office was being "blatant" in its interference. It has called Lai and Hsiao an "independence double act".翻译:台湾外交部长吴钊燮周五表示，中国台湾事务办公室的干涉是“公然”的。它称黎和萧为“独立双星”。

"They are commenting in very negative language about Vice President Lai or the vice presidential candidate Bi-khim Hsiao. Those kinds of statements have already told the Taiwanese people that they want to interfere in Taiwan's election and they want to shape the results of the election," Wu said.翻译:“他们用非常负面的语言评论赖昌星副总统或副总统候选人萧美琴。这些言论已经告诉台湾人民，他们想要干涉台湾选举，他们想要影响选举结果”吴说。

"They are doing all sorts of things to interfere in our election and we can expect more leading up to our polling date.翻译:“他们正在做各种各样的事情来干扰我们的选举，我们预计在投票日期之前会有更多的事情发生。

China's Taiwan Affairs Office did not respond to a request for comment on Friday about Taiwan's interference accusations. Previously it has said only that it respects Taiwan's "social systems".翻译:中国台湾事务办公室周五没有回应就台湾干涉指控发表评论的请求。此前它只表示尊重台湾的“社会制度”。

It has, however, framed the election as a vote between war and peace, and urged Taiwan's people to carefully consider their choices.翻译:然而，它把这次选举定性为战争与和平之间的投票，并敦促台湾人民仔细考虑他们的选择。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Additional reporting by Faith Hung and Sarah Wu; Editing by Christopher Cushing and William Mallard翻译:本·布兰查德报道； Faith Hung 和 Sarah Wu 的补充报道；克里斯托弗·库欣和威廉·马拉德编辑
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 习近平访问河内，中国对越南投资激增，美国支出下降
item.description:
Summary:
  • Xi's visit to follow Biden's in September
  • China (with HK) is top investor in Vietnam this year
  • U.S. investment, trade have so far dropped in 2023
翻译:概括：
  • 习近平继拜登之后于九月访华
  • 中国（与香港）是今年越南最大的投资者
  • 2023 年美国投资和贸易迄今均有所下降

Chinese investments in Vietnam have boomed this year in contrast to a slowdown in U.S. spending and trade, official data show, as the world's two largest economies vie for influence in the strategic Southeast Asian country.翻译:官方数据显示，今年中国在越南的投资蓬勃发展，与美国支出和贸易放缓形成鲜明对比，世界最大的两个经济体正在争夺这个东南亚战略国家的影响力。

The manufacturing hub stretching along the South China Sea is increasingly a key assembling link in global supply chains that often rely on Chinese components and U.S. consumers.翻译:沿着南中国海延伸的制造中心日益成为全球供应链中的关键组装环节，而全球供应链往往依赖中国零部件和美国消费者。

U.S. President Joe Biden achieved an upgrade of diplomatic relations with the former foe in a visit to Hanoi in September, after a year of intense diplomatic efforts to elevate the United States to the same tier as China in Vietnam's ranking.翻译:经过一年的紧张外交努力，美国总统乔·拜登在9月份访问河内时实现了与这个前敌人的外交关系升级，以将美国在越南的排名提升到与中国相同的级别。

China's President Xi Jinping will travel to Vietnam next week with the aim of further deepening ties. He may agree to declare that the two countries share a common destiny, diplomats said, which could be interpreted in Beijing as a formal upgrade of diplomatic relations.翻译:中国国家主席习近平将于 下周访问越南，旨在进一步深化两国关系。外交官们表示，他可能同意宣布两国拥有共同的命运，这在北京可能会被解读为外交关系的正式升级。

It is unclear which symbolic upgrade carries more weight, but in economic terms China appears to have had the upper hand so far, partly as a consequence of U.S. trade policy. Tensions between Washington and Beijing and various U.S.-led sanctions on China in recent years have encouraged Chinese investment in Vietnam.翻译:目前尚不清楚哪种象征性升级更具影响力，但从经济角度来看，中国迄今为止似乎占据上风，部分原因是美国贸易政策的结果。近年来，华盛顿和北京之间的紧张关系以及美国主导的对中国的各种制裁鼓励了中国对越南的投资。

Registered investment from China and Hong Kong combined rose to $8.2 billion in the first 11 months of this year, according to Vietnam's official statistics, twice as much as in the same period last year when China had pandemic restrictions, making them the biggest investors in Vietnam.翻译:据越南官方统计，今年前11个月，中国内地和香港的注册投资总额增至82亿美元，是去年中国实施疫情限制期间同期的两倍，成为越南最大的投资者。

U.S. registered investment instead has fallen to $0.5 billion this year from $0.7 billion in 2022, making it the 10th largest investor after Pacific offshore centre Samoa and the Netherlands.翻译:美国的注册投资额却从 2022 年的 7 亿美元降至今年的 5 亿美元，成为继太平洋离岸中心萨摩亚和荷兰之后的第十大投资者。

Bilateral trade also dropped, as U.S. consumers grappled with a cost-of-living crisis this year and no tariff cuts were agreed during Biden's visit.翻译:由于美国消费者今年面临生活成本危机，而且拜登访问期间没有就关税削减达成一致，双边贸易也有所下降。

Exports from Vietnam to the United States plunged 15% to $79.25 billion in the first 10 months of the year, Vietnam data show, and U.S. imports fell as well.翻译:越南数据显示，今年前 10 个月，越南对美国的出口骤降 15%，至 792.5 亿美元，美国进口也下降。

In the same period Vietnam's exports to China increased by 5% to nearly $50 billion, although imports fell as Vietnam largely buys from Beijing components that are assembled for export to Western countries.翻译:同期，越南对中国的出口增长了 5%，达到近 500 亿美元，但进口有所下降，因为越南主要从北京购买零部件，组装后出口到西方国家。

Despite strong economic exchanges, relations with China are complicated by disputes over boundaries in the South China Sea. Anti-Chinese sentiment is also common among Vietnamese people, and it leads to frequent protests, including one in 2018 against the creation of special economic zones that could have benefitted Chinese companies.

DE-RISKING

The U.S. diplomatic upgrade came with the White House's pledges of more investments and easier trade.翻译:美国外交升级伴随着白宫承诺增加投资和更便利的贸易。

"Despite the fanfare during Biden's visit we have not seen so far a lot materialise," said Zachary Abuza, professor on Southeast Asian politics at the National War College in Washington DC, noting foreign businesses face significant challenges when investing in Vietnam.翻译:华盛顿特区国家战争学院东南亚政治学教授扎卡里·阿布扎表示：“尽管拜登访问期间大肆宣传，但迄今为止我们还没有看到太多成果。”他指出，外国企业在越南投资时面临着重大挑战。

Several Vietnam-based business consultants signalled an increase in U.S. investors' interest and noted that investment decisions take time to be made.翻译:几位驻越南的商业顾问表示，美国投资者的兴趣有所增加，并指出投资决策需要时间做出。

The parallel boom in Chinese investment, which excluding Hong Kong has nearly doubled this year above pre-pandemic levels to $3.9 billion, is partly explained by companies' de-risking strategies amid U.S.-China trade tensions, said Kyle Freeman, partner at business consultancy Dezan Shira.翻译:商业咨询公司合伙人凯尔·弗里曼(Kyle Freeman)表示，中国投资的同步繁荣（不包括香港）今年的投资额比大流行前的水平几乎翻了一番，达到39亿美元，部分原因是企业在中美贸易紧张局势下采取了去风险策略。德赞·希拉.

China's slowdown has also been a factor on investment decisions, said Chad Ovel, partner at Vietnam-focused private equity firm Mekong Capital. "(The) poor short to moderate-term macro outlook in China is motivating Chinese to find investment opportunities outside of their own country."翻译:专注于越南的私募股权公司湄公资本合伙人查德·奥维尔表示，中国经济放缓也是影响投资决策的一个因素。 “中国短期至中期宏观前景不佳正在促使中国人寻找本国以外的投资机会。”

item.title: 中国开发商世茂发布重组离岸债务计划后股价持平
item.description:
Shares in Chinese property developer Shimao Group (0813.HK) were flat on Friday after it issued a restructuring plan to reduce up to $7 billion in offshore debt, becoming the latest developer in China to try to revamp its debt.翻译:中国房地产开发商世茂集团（0813.HK）发布重组计划以减少最多70亿美元的海外债务，成为中国最新一家试图重组债务的开发商，该公司股价周五持平。

The developer, with around $11.7 billion in offshore notes, bonds and other credit facilities has been pushing forward plans to revamp its debts over the past few months, Shimao said in a filing to the Hong Kong Stock Exchange late on Thursday.翻译:世茂在周四晚间向香港证券交易所提交的文件中表示，过去几个月，这家拥有约 117 亿美元离岸票据、债券和其他信贷安排的开发商一直在推进债务重组计划。

It has proposed to a key group of creditors to exchange some debt for new loans with maturities up to nine years, new senior secured debts and equity-linked instruments, it said.翻译:它表示，它已向一组关键债权人提议将部分债务换成期限最长为九年的新贷款、新的高级担保债务和股票挂钩工具。

Shimao plans to decrease its debt by approximately $6 billion to $7 billion "to enhance the group's financial strength and business operations", the filing said.翻译:文件称，世茂计划将债务减少约60亿至70亿美元，“以增强集团的财务实力和业务运营”。

Following the filing, Shimao was trading flat on Friday morning, while the broader Hong Kong index (.HSMPI) tracking Chinese developers dipped 1.7%.翻译:该文件提交后，世茂周五上午交易持平，而追踪中国开发商的香港综合指数(.HSMPI)下跌 1.7%。

No definitive agreement on the offshore restructuring has been made with creditors, the filing said.翻译:文件称，尚未与债权人就离岸重组达成最终协议。

Chinese developers are still struggling with declining property sales, while investors remain concerned about spillover to China's broader financial system and harm to its economic growth outlook. China's property sector accounts for roughly a quarter of the world's second-largest economy.翻译:中国开发商仍在努力应对房地产销售下降的问题，而投资者仍然担心对中国更广泛的金融体系的溢出效应以及对其经济增长前景的损害。中国的房地产业约占世界第二大经济体的四分之一。

Shimao, the first major Chinese developer to kick off formal negotiations on restructuring terms with creditors, initially proposed a plan last August to repay its offshore debt over a period of three to eight years.翻译:世茂是第一家与债权人启动重组条款正式谈判的中国大型开发商，最初于去年八月提出了一项在三到八年内偿还海外债务的计划。

The Shanghai-based developer, which defaulted on its first offshore payment last July, has been seeking to sell one of its hotels in Hong Kong since March to fetch at least $828 million as part of its debt recovery plan.翻译:这家总部位于上海的开发商去年 7 月拖欠了第一笔离岸付款，自 3 月以来，该开发商一直寻求出售其在香港的一家酒店，以获取至少 8.28 亿美元的价格，作为其债务回收计划的一部分。

Reporting by Xie Yu; Editing by Tom Hogue翻译:谢宇报道；汤姆·霍格编辑

item.title: 中国美容市场放缓，大品牌折扣并不能解决问题
item.description:
Expensive beauty hauls are a thing of the past for Evelyn Zhu. The Chinese branding professional says she now only spends on skincare essentials, joining millions of other consumers who have cut back on cosmetics in the world's second biggest market.翻译:对于 Evelyn Zhu 来说，昂贵的美容服务已经成为过去。这位中国品牌专业人士表示，她现在只在护肤必需品上花钱，加入了全球第二大市场数百万其他消费者的行列，减少了化妆品的消费。

"In recent years we all bought so many products," the 32-year-old from the affluent eastern city of Hangzhou said. "My bathroom cupboard is full, it's hard to say I need much more."翻译:“这几年我们都买了很多产品，”这位来自东部富裕城市杭州的 32 岁男子说。 “我的浴室柜子已经满了，很难说我还需要更多。”

This restraint, which has taken hold amid a slowing economy, spells bad news for global firms such as L'Oreal (OREP.PA), Estee Lauder (EL.N) and LVMH (LVMH.PA) who for years banked on China's $52 billion beauty market for growth.翻译:这种限制在经济放缓的情况下生效，对欧莱雅（OREP.PA） 、雅诗兰黛（EL.N）和路威酩轩（LVMH.PA）等跨国公司来说是个坏消息，这些公司多年来一直寄希望于中国的52美元。亿美元的美容市场增长。

Regional brands such as Japan's Shiseido (4911.T), which counted China as its top market for years, are also struggling.翻译:多年来将中国视为其最大市场的日本资生堂（4911.T）等区域品牌也陷入困境。

But while the economic woes have certainly weighed on sales, analysts say the main issue facing the multinationals is their slowness to adjust to the shifting priorities of consumers, who have become more discerning about what they buy and are increasingly finding that local brands are more suited to their needs.翻译:不过，尽管经济困境无疑对销售造成了压力，但分析人士表示，跨国公司面临的主要问题是它们适应消费者优先事项变化的速度缓慢，消费者对购买的商品变得更加挑剔，并且越来越发现本土品牌更适合。以满足他们的需求。

"What Chinese consumers are still keen to spend on are high efficacy products," said William Lau, chief executive of multibrand beauty retailer Bonnie and Clyde, which stocks luxury international brands including Chantecaille and 111skin.翻译:“中国消费者仍然热衷于购买高效能产品，”多品牌美容零售商 Bonnie and Clyde 首席执行官 William Lau 表示，该公司销售 Chantecaille 和 111skin 等国际奢侈品牌。

"What you're seeing is a downgrade in lifestyle-driven luxury and premium brands," he added.翻译:“你所看到的是生活方式驱动的奢侈品牌和高端品牌的降级，”他补充道。

Botanee Biotech's sensitive skincare brand Winona is one of the beneficiaries of this paring back.翻译:Botanee Biotech 的敏感护肤品牌 Winona 是此次削减的受益者之一。

The Chinese brand, which is priced at around the same level as L'Oreal products, is known for combating redness, a concern that marketing firm iResearch reported affects two-fifth of women. Analysts from CMB International estimate Botanee's revenue will grow almost 18% this year to 5.9 billion yuan ($824 million), with Winona responsible for most of these gains.翻译:这个中国品牌的价格与欧莱雅产品大致相同，以抗红血丝而闻名，营销公司艾瑞咨询报告称，五分之二的女性都担心红血丝问题。 CMB International 的分析师估计 Botanee 今年的收入将增长近 18%，达到 59 亿元人民币（8.24 亿美元），其中大部分收益来自 Winona。

By comparison, sales for the global beauty giants are expected to fall.

DEEP DISCOUNTS

An analysis from brokerage Jefferies showed first half China sales down 8% at LVMH's beauty division, while sales at Estée Lauder Companies, which counts on China for one-third of its business, fell 12 percent over the same period.翻译:经纪公司 Jefferies 的分析显示，上半年 LVMH 旗下美容部门的中国销售额下降了 8%，而三分之一业务依赖中国的雅诗兰黛公司同期销售额下降了 12%。

Shiseido reduced its full-year profit forecast in November on slower China demand, which has also been hit by a boycott by some consumer of Japanese products following the release of treated radioactive wastewater in August.翻译:由于中国需求放缓，资生堂在 11 月份下调了全年利润预期，而在 8 月份处理后的放射性废水排放后，一些日本产品消费者抵制日本产品也受到了打击。

L'Oreal, Estee Lauder and Shiseido did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:欧莱雅、雅诗兰黛和资生堂没有回应置评请求。

These results also come off the lower base of 2022, when the combined colour cosmetics and skincare markets in China lost 9.5% of their value, data from Euromonitor shows.翻译:Euromonitor 的数据显示，这些结果也是基于 2022 年的较低基数得出的，当时中国彩妆和护肤品市场的总价值损失了 9.5%。

While the market research firm expects growth of around 6% this year, it forecast won't get back to its 2021 market size of $54.4 billion until 2025.翻译:尽管这家市场研究公司预计今年的增长率约为 6%，但预计要到 2025 年才能恢复到 2021 年 544 亿美元的市场规模。

So far, the multinationals have responded to the slowdown by offering deep discounts of up to 40% and gifts during peak shopping events such as the annual online Singles Day festival, but analysts say the data shows even that isn't really helping.翻译:到目前为止，跨国公司已经通过在一年一度的在线双十一等高峰购物活动期间提供高达 40% 的大幅折扣和礼品来应对经济放缓，但分析师表示，数据显示，即使这样也没有真正的帮助。

Luxe skincare brand La Mer, which rarely discounts, gave so many gifts-with-purchase over Singles Day that every sale resulted in almost the same amount of product being given away.翻译:很少打折的奢华护肤品牌 La Mer 在双十一期间赠送了如此多的购物赠品，以至于每次销售都会赠送几乎相同数量的产品。

Independent data firm Syntun estimated that GMV, or gross merchandising volume, of beauty and personal care fell 6% year-on-year across all online shopping platforms. GMV is commonly used proxy for sales among e-commerce operators.翻译:独立数据公司Syntun估计，所有在线购物平台的美容和个人护理商品的GMV（商品交易总额）同比下降了6%。 GMV是电商运营商常用的销售额指标。

"The biggest global names have seen their Tmall GMV decrease by about 40% on average during 11.11," said Jacques Roizen, the Shanghai-based managing director of consulting at Digital Luxury Group, a digital agency for luxury brands.翻译:奢侈品牌数字代理机构 Digital Luxury Group 驻上海的咨询董事总经理雅克·罗伊森 (Jacques Roizen) 表示：“11.11 期间，全球最大品牌的天猫 GMV 平均下降了约 40%。”

"Now we see you don't have discounting as an acceleration lever you can press to go deeper or wider, because they're already maxed out," Roizen added.翻译:罗伊森补充道：“现在我们发现，你已经没有折扣作为加速杆了，你可以按下去更深或更广，因为它们已经达到了极限。”

Gregoire Grandchamp, co-founder of Next Beauty, a brand management partner for niche beauty players looking to grow in the China market, said the discounts offered by the beauty brands online this year have been "insane".翻译:Next Beauty 是寻求在中国市场发展的小众美容品牌的品牌管理合作伙伴，其联合创始人格雷瓜尔·格兰尚 (Gregoire Grandchamp) 表示，今年美容品牌在网上提供的折扣“疯狂”。

But while these larger brands are better able to compete online than smaller companies that lack their marketing budgets, they are not immune to the slowdown in demand.翻译:不过，尽管这些大品牌比缺乏营销预算的小公司更有能力在线竞争，但它们也无法免受需求放缓的影响。

According to Grandchamp, the sooner they adjust to China's new normal of single-digit growth rather than chasing the growth of yesteryear with brand equity-eroding discounts, the better.翻译:Grandchamp 认为，他们越早适应中国个位数增长的新常态，而不是通过削弱品牌资产的折扣来追逐去年的增长，就越好。

"I think the way groups like L'Oreal will react will be to say, Okay, maybe it's better not to have this euphoric growth, but to be more in a more rational market," he said.翻译:“我认为像欧莱雅这样的集团的反应方式会是说，好吧，也许最好不要出现这种欣喜若狂的增长，而是更多地处于一个更加理性的市场中，”他说。

($1 = 7.1608 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1608 人民币）

item.title: 解释者：刚果选举对投资者来说有何利害关系？
item.description:
Voters in Democratic Republic of Congo go to the polls on Dec. 20 and international investors are keenly watching to see if a political shake-up occurs in one of the world's top suppliers of critical minerals.翻译:刚果民主共和国选民将于 12 月 20 日前往投票站，国际投资者正在密切关注这个全球最大的关键矿产供应商之一是否会发生政治变动。

A win for President Felix Tshisekedi would likely mean a continuation of his goal to lure more foreign investment and renegotiate contracts to improve terms for Congo.翻译:菲利克斯·齐塞克迪总统的胜利可能意味着他将继续实现吸引更多外国投资和重新谈判合同以改善刚果条件的目标。

Tshisekedi's opponents include mining magnate Moise Katumbi and former oil executive Martin Fayulu whose business backgrounds they both say will help them clean up Congo's corruption-plagued extractive industries if they win.

MINES & MINERALS

Congo is the world's biggest producer of cobalt, a key component in batteries for electric cars and mobile phones. It is also the world's third-largest copper producer and holds significant deposits of lithium, tin, tungsten, tantalum and gold.翻译:刚果是世界上最大的钴生产国，钴是电动汽车和手机电池的关键成分。它也是世界第三大铜生产国，并拥有大量锂、锡、钨、钽和金矿藏。

The Congolese mining sector, particularly its copper and cobalt mines, is now largely dominated by Chinese companies, but Tshisekedi has tried to woo other foreign investors and renegotiate existing deals to improve Congo's stake in major projects.翻译:刚果采矿业，特别是铜矿和钴矿，目前主要由中国公司主导，但齐塞克迪试图吸引其他外国投资者，并重新谈判现有交易，以提高刚果在重大项目中的股份。

"A Tshisekedi victory would provide a degree of policy continuity for investors in the mining sector, albeit of a resource nationalist nature," said Aleix Montana, Africa Analyst at risk intelligence company Verisk Maplecroft.翻译:风险情报公司 Verisk Maplecroft 的非洲分析师阿莱克斯·蒙塔纳 (Aleix Montana) 表示：“齐塞克迪的胜利将为采矿业投资者提供一定程度的政策连续性，尽管具有资源民族主义性质。”

Whoever wins will have to take the lead on ongoing talks with China including on the new terms for the Sicomines joint venture, part of a $6 billion metals-for-infrastructure deal from 2008.翻译:无论谁获胜，都必须主导与中国正在进行的谈判，包括华刚合资企业的新条款，这是 2008 年价值 60 亿美元的金属换基础设施交易的一部分。

"Tshisekedi in a new term would have stronger legs to stand on in terms of the negotiating position," said Indigo Ellis, managing director at consultancy Africa Matters Ltd (AML).翻译:咨询公司 Africa Matters Ltd (AML) 董事总经理 Indigo Ellis 表示：“齐塞克迪在新任期内将在谈判中拥有更强大的地位。”

With Tshisekedi's backing, state mining group Gecamines has also said it plans to renegotiate some terms on its joint venture contracts with partners including Glencore (GLEN.L) and Chinese investors in a push to buy copper and cobalt proportional to its stakes.

OIL & GAS

Tshisekedi has tried to develop Congo's largely untapped fossil fuel reserves by auctioning the rights to 30 oil and gas blocks – many of them in environmentally sensitive areas.翻译:齐塞克迪试图通过拍卖 30 个石油和天然气区块（其中许多位于环境敏感地区）的权利来开发刚果大部分未开发的化石燃料储备。

The sale was officially launched in July 2022, but the auctions have been plagued by delays with only the licensing round for the three gas blocks completed so far albeit with the notable absence of major foreign players.翻译:此次出售于 2022 年 7 月正式启动，但拍卖一直受到延误的困扰，尽管主要外国参与者明显缺席，但迄今为止仅完成了三个天然气区块的许可轮。

The government says Congo has 22 billion barrels of crude reserves and it is targeting production of 200,000 barrels per day, which would make Congo one of Africa's biggest oil producers. The timeline for the development of the blocks remains unclear.

RISKY BUSINESS

Tshisekedi came to power with the promise to root out endemic corruption. Many Western investors have continued to steer clear, but analysts say that may change in the coming years as global powers seek access to minerals needed to drive the clean energy transition.翻译:齐塞克迪上台时承诺根除腐败现象。许多西方投资者继续回避，但分析人士表示，随着全球大国寻求获得推动清洁能源转型所需的矿产资源，这种情况在未来几年可能会发生变化。

"The race ... is forcing Western miners to re-evaluate their risk appetite, said Montana from Verisk Maplecroft, which rates Congo seventh worst globally on its index that assesses the risk of governments seizing more control of revenue from the extractives sector.翻译:Verisk Maplecroft 的蒙大拿表示，“这场竞争……正在迫使西方矿商重新评估他们的风险偏好。该公司在其评估政府从采掘业夺取更多控制权的风险指数中将刚果评为全球第七差。”

Nevertheless many investors are waiting to see that elections go peacefully and the transfer to the next term is smooth. The last election in 2018 was the first transfer of power at the ballot box after decades marked by coups and civil conflict.翻译:尽管如此，许多投资者仍在等待选举和平进行以及顺利过渡到下一届任期。 2018 年的最后一次选举是数十年来政变和内战之后首次通过投票箱进行权力交接。

"It makes sense for them (investors) to wait and see what happens," said AML's Ellis.翻译:AML 的埃利斯表示：“对他们（投资者）来说，观望会发生什么是有意义的。”

item.title: 卡梅伦和布林肯表示，他们讨论了“重要的”美国迪戈加西亚空军基地
item.description:
British Foreign Secretary David Cameron and U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Thursday they had discussed the "vital" U.S.-UK Indian Ocean air base at Diego Garcia, and Blinken said Washington recognized British sovereignty there.翻译:英国外交大臣戴维·卡梅伦和美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯周四表示，他们已经讨论了位于迪戈加西亚岛的“至关重要的”美英印度洋空军基地，布林肯表示华盛顿承认英国对该基地的主权。

The air base is on British Indian Ocean Territory in the Chagos Islands that a vote in the United Nations General Assembly in 2019 said should be returned to Mauritius.翻译:该空军基地位于查戈斯群岛的英属印度洋领地，2019 年联合国大会投票表示应将其归还给毛里求斯。

Cameron did not give a specific response at a joint news conference with Blinken when asked about a report in Britain's Daily Telegraph this month that said British Defence Minister Grant Shapps wanted Britain to drop plans to hand back the islands.翻译:卡梅伦在与布林肯举行的联合新闻发布会上被问及英国《每日电讯报》本月的一篇报道时没有给出具体回应，该报道称英国国防部长格兰特·沙普斯希望英国放弃归还这些岛屿的计划。

"On the issue of the vital U.S. air base at Diego Garcia, when foreign secretaries and secretaries of state get together, they often discuss the importance of the assets that we share and use around the world, and that is an important one, and we touched on that this afternoon," Cameron said.翻译:“在美国重要的迪戈加西亚空军基地问题上，当外交大臣和国务卿聚在一起时，他们经常讨论我们在世界各地共享和使用的资产的重要性，这是一个重要的问题，我们今天下午谈到了这一点，”卡梅伦说。

Blinken said the base played a vital role for the U.S. in the Indo-Pacific region and for global security.翻译:布林肯表示，该基地对美国在印太地区和全球安全发挥着至关重要的作用。

"It enables our own support for regional stability; gives us an ability to respond rapidly to crises, and also to counter some of the most challenging threats that we face," he said.翻译:他说：“它使我们能够支持地区稳定；使我们能够快速应对危机，并应对我们面临的一些最具挑战性的威胁。”

"We ...recognize UK sovereignty over British Indian Ocean Territory," Blinken said, while adding: "But this is a bilateral matter for the UK and Mauritius to work out and we support their engagement to resolve the differences."翻译:布林肯表示：“我们……承认英国对英属印度洋领土的主权，但这是英国和毛里求斯需要解决的双边问题，我们支持他们参与解决分歧。”

Britain, which has overseen the region since 1814, detached the Chagos islands in 1965 from Mauritius - a colony that gained independence three years later - to create the British Indian Ocean Territory.翻译:英国自 1814 年以来一直监管该地区，并于 1965 年将查戈斯群岛从毛里求斯（三年后获得独立的殖民地）分离出来，创建英属印度洋领地。

The British government leased the Chagos archipelago's biggest island, Diego Garcia, to the United States in 1966, paving the way for construction of an airbase that required the forced removal of some 2,000 people.翻译:1966 年，英国政府将查戈斯群岛最大的岛屿迪戈加西亚岛租给美国，为建设空军基地铺平了道路，该基地需要强行撤离约 2,000 人。

Diego Garcia became an important U.S. base during the Iraq and Afghanistan conflicts, acting as a launch pad for long-range bombers.翻译:迪戈加西亚岛在伊拉克和阿富汗冲突期间成为美国的重要基地，充当远程轰炸机的发射台。

Britain conceded in 2008 that the U.S. had used Diego Garcia for "rendition" flights to transfer terrorism suspects, having maintaining for years that it was unaware of such activity.翻译:英国于2008年承认，美国曾利用迪戈加西亚岛进行“引渡”航班来转移恐怖主义嫌疑人，但多年来英国一直坚称不知道此类活动。

In 2016, Britain extended the U.S. lease of Diego Garcia until 2036 and some British politicians now want to keep control of the islands for longer.翻译:2016年，英国将美国对迪戈加西亚岛的租约延长至2036年，一些英国政客现在希望更长时间地保持对这些岛屿的控制。

In 2019, the African Union called on Britain to withdraw from the Chagos Islands and end its "continued colonial administration" there after a U.N. deadline for it to do so expired.翻译:2019年，非洲联盟呼吁英国在联合国规定的最后期限到期后从查戈斯群岛撤军并结束在那里“持续的殖民统治”。

Reporting by Simon Lewis, David Brunnstrom and Rami Ayyub in Washington; Additional reporting by Alistair Smout in London; Editing by Leslie Adler and David Gregorio翻译:西蒙·刘易斯、大卫·布伦斯特罗姆和拉米·阿尤布在华盛顿的报道； Alistair Smout 在伦敦的补充报道；莱斯利·阿德勒和大卫·格雷戈里奥编辑

item.title: 中国放松毛泽东时代居住规定的努力遇到障碍
item.description:
Yang Guang's rise from a village farmer to an Audi-driving businessman with two properties hinged largely on one of the most coveted documents in China: an urban hukou, or residency permit.翻译:杨光从一个乡村农民成长为拥有两处房产、开着奥迪车的商人，很大程度上取决于中国最令人垂涎​​的文件之一：城市户口或居住证。

The 45-year-old who lives in the central city of Zhengzhou likens the permit - which typically ties a person's access to health, education, loans and other services to their birthplace - to a "cattle ear-tag the state clipped us with".翻译:这位住在中部城市郑州的 45 岁男子将许可证比作“国家给我们剪的牛耳标”——它通常将一个人获得医疗、教育、贷款和其他服务的机会与其出生地联系起来。 。

"It uses this tag to sort us into different categories of people entitled to different sets of privileges and subjected to different obligations," he said.翻译:“它使用这个标签将我们分为不同类别的人，这些人有权享有不同的特权并承担不同的义务，”他说。

When Zhengzhou in the early 2000s temporarily allowed those who bought an apartment to also qualify for a city hukou, Yang seized the opportunity, allowing him to register a business and open stores across Henan province's capital, transforming his fortunes.翻译:2000年代初期，郑州暂时允许购房者获得城市户口，杨抓住了这个机会，允许他在河南省会城市注册企业并开设商店，改变了他的命运。

In recent months, Chinese authorities have fanned hopes among some economists that the internal passport system that has largely tethered people's destinies to their place of origin since the 1950s may be in its dying days. A distressed property market and sluggish consumption have injected new urgency into a drive to loosen restrictions and grant more people the opportunities that urban registration affords.翻译:近几个月来，中国当局在一些经济学家中激起了希望，即自 20 世纪 50 年代以来在很大程度上将人们的命运与原籍地联系在一起的内部护照制度可能已到了消亡的时候。 低迷的房地产市场和低迷的消费为放松限制、为更多人提供落户机会注入了新的紧迫性。

The Ministry of Public Security in August called on cities with up to 3 million people to abolish hukou, and those with 3-5 million to significantly relax issuance. Zhejiang and Jiangsu provinces have announced plans for an almost complete opening to new residents.翻译:公安部8月呼吁人口300万以下的城市取消户口，人口3-500万的城市大幅放宽户口发放。浙江和江苏省已宣布计划几乎全面向新居民开放。

But two people involved in hukou policy discussions within the central government told Reuters that progress is stalling, making further significant breakthroughs unlikely, especially in China's larger cities.翻译:但两名参与中央政府内部户口政策讨论的人士告诉路透社，进展正在停滞，不可能取得进一步的重大突破，尤其是在中国的大城市。

The accounts described previously unreported tensions over hukou reform, with Chinese officials acknowledging a strong economic rationale for change but hesitant to take decisive moves that might disrupt social stability and burden indebted cities with added costs.翻译:这些报道描述了此前未报道过的户口改革紧张局势，中国官员承认改革有强有力的经济理由，但不愿采取果断行动，因为这可能会破坏社会稳定并给负债城市带来额外成本。

"Hukou reform is a hard bone to chew," said Jia Kang, founding president of the China Academy of New Supply-Side Economics, who advises the government on policies including hukou. "It should be a natural process, it's not something you can do simply because you want to."翻译:“户口改革是一块难啃的骨头，”中国新供给侧经济研究院创始院长贾康说，他为政府提供包括户口在内的政策建议。 “这应该是一个自然的过程，不是你想做就能做的事情。”

"Currently, all reforms are difficult."翻译:“目前，一切改革都困难重重。”

Jia said that while neither the central government nor local governments oppose further hukou easing, implementation depends on cities having the funds and public service capacity.翻译:贾庆林表示，虽然中央政府和地方政府都不反对进一步放宽户口，但具体实施取决于城市有资金和公共服务能力。

China's Ministry of Public Security and the National Development and Reform Commission, the top planning agency, did not respond to requests for comment.翻译:中国公安部和最高规划机构国家发展和改革委员会没有回应置评请求。

The advisers said China's largest cities have limited residential supply and face pollution and congestion, affecting their ability to absorb more people. Medium-sized and smaller cities have excess housing stock they would gladly offer to new residents, but due to surging debt they lack the funds to expand access to health facilities, elderly care and education.翻译:顾问们表示，中国最大的城市住宅供应有限，并面临污染和拥堵，影响了它们吸纳更多人口的能力。中小城市拥有过剩的住房存量，他们很乐意向新居民提供，但由于债务激增，他们缺乏资金来扩大医疗设施、养老和教育的覆盖范围。

"The quality of our urbanisation is poor," said the second government adviser, who spoke on the condition of anonymity due to the topic's sensitivity.翻译:“我们的城市化质量很差，”第二位政府顾问说，由于该话题的敏感性，他要求匿名。

Most Chinese cities grew dramatically over the past four decades as the country opened up to entrepreneurship and invested in transport infrastructure and residential projects. But the world's second-largest economy still lags the 80-90% urbanisation rate in the developed world.翻译:随着国家开放创业精神并投资交通基础设施和住宅项目，大多数中国城市在过去四十年中急剧增长。但世界第二大经济体的城市化率仍落后于发达国家80%至90%的水平。

About 65% of China's 1.4 billion people live in urban areas, compared with 55% in 2013. But only 48% of the population have a city hukou, official data show. That gap has remained steady throughout the period.翻译:中国14亿人口中约有65%居住在城市地区，而2013年这一比例为55%。但官方数据显示，只有48%的人口拥有城市户口。这一差距在此期间一直保持稳定。

While Beijing is working to address strains in local finances, another set of reforms to encourage more people to settle in cities is not in the pipeline, the advisers said.翻译:顾问们表示，虽然北京正在努力解决地方财政紧张的问题，但另一套鼓励更多人在城市定居的改革尚未酝酿之中。

In China, rural hukou come with land rights - and, implicitly, the insurance policy of living off the farm if city jobs are unavailable - making many migrant workers from the countryside reluctant to apply for urban permits, especially in a slowing economy.翻译:在中国，农村户口伴随着土地权——而且隐含着如果无法获得城市工作就以务农为生的保险政策——使得许多来自农村的农民工不愿意申请城市居住证，尤其是在经济放缓的情况下。

Local governments can lease land for farming, as well as residential, commercial and industrial development, but there is no private land ownership in China and land rights cannot be traded freely.翻译:地方政府可以租赁土地用于农业以及住宅、商业和工业开发，但中国不存在土地私有制，土地权不能自由交易。

"We must push forward land system reform. We have plenty of land, which has been wasted," the second adviser said, adding however that China's leaders are unwilling to go down that path.翻译:“我们必须推进土地制度改革。我们有大量土地，但都被浪费了，”第二位顾问说，但他补充说，中国领导人不愿意走这条路。

Shao Xiaogai, a 39-year-old store manager in Zhengzhou, prefers to stay registered in her village in the central Henan province. She had tried to get an urban hukou to make it easier to enrol her son in a public school, but a spot opened up for him eventually anyway.翻译:39 岁的郑州商店经理邵小改更愿意留在河南省中部的村庄。她曾试图获得城市户口，以便更容易让儿子进入公立学校就读，但最终还是为他腾出了一个名额。

"I tell my son to study hard because we are outsiders in this city," said Shao. "If he doesn't do well here, his dad and I will become his burden if we stay in the city. In the village, we can grow whatever food we need."翻译:“我告诉儿子要努力学习，因为我们是这个城市的外人，”邵说。 “如果他在这里过得不好，我和他爸爸留在城里就会成为他的负担。在村里，我们可以种植任何我们需要的食物。”

Jia said these hurdles mean further hukou liberalisation will be on a city-by-city basis. The second adviser said the pace of urbanisation will slow in coming years, making rural revitalisation more of a priority for China's leaders.

CONSUMING LESS

Hukou date back to the famines of last century, when Mao Zedong tied food rations to people's birthplaces to prevent starving peasants from flocking to better-fed cities.翻译:户口可以追溯到上个世纪的饥荒，当时毛泽东将粮食配给与人们的出生地挂钩，以防止饥饿的农民涌入食物更好的城市。

In their modern iteration, hukou limit access to public services for many of the almost 300 million rural migrants who leave their families behind to assemble the smartphones, raise the skyscrapers, lay the roads and clean the malls in Chinese cities.翻译:在现代版本中，户口限制了近3亿农民工获得公共服务的机会，他们离开家人在中国城市组装智能手机、建造摩天大楼、铺设道路和打扫商场。

Migrants get smaller reimbursements for medical expenses than those with urban registration and cannot take their employer's contributions to retirement savings - two-thirds of the pot - with them when they return home.翻译:与城市户口的农民工相比，农民工获得的医疗费用报销要少，而且回国时也不能带走雇主缴纳的退休储蓄金（三分之二）。

As a result, they save more of their income, keeping household consumption - which China wants to make a more prominent driver of economic growth - subdued.翻译:结果，他们将更多收入储蓄起来，从而抑制了家庭消费——中国希望家庭消费成为经济增长的更重要推动力。

Cai Fang, a central bank adviser, estimates migrant workers typically spend 23% less than those with urban hukou, potentially depriving the economy of more than 2 trillion yuan ($281 billion) - or 1.7% of last year's GDP - in domestic consumption annually.翻译:央行顾问蔡昉估计，农民工的支出通常比城市户口的农民工少 23%，这可能会导致经济每年损失超过 2 万亿元人民币（2810 亿美元）的国内消费，即去年 GDP 的 1.7%。

There's also the imperative of boosting demand for apartments, of which China has too many. The property market, which accounts for roughly a quarter of the economy, has been rattled by private developer defaults.翻译:提高公寓需求也势在必行，而中国的公寓数量太多了。约占经济四分之一的房地产市场因私人开发商违约而陷入困境。

The market would "substantially improve if migrants could be treated more equally" through improved access to better jobs and benefits and enabling them to buy apartments, said Martin Whyte, professor emeritus of international studies and sociology at Harvard University.

'LOW-END POPULATION'

An uncontrolled influx of migrants into the cities, however, may present risks for China's leaders.翻译:然而，不受控制的农民工涌入城市可能会给中国领导人带来风险。

In 2017, after a fire broke out in migrant workers' living quarters, Beijing authorities launched a campaign to expel people without capital-city hukou, sparking a rare open backlash against the government.翻译:2017年，农民工宿舍发生火灾后，北京当局发起了驱逐无京城户口人员的运动，引发了罕见的公开反对政府的反弹。

Mega-cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen and Guangzhou have "no chance" of opening up in coming years due to "considerations of social stability and harmony", said Jia.翻译:贾表示，出于“社会稳定和谐的考虑”，北京、上海、深圳和广州等大城市“没有机会”在未来几年开放。

"Beijing tried to drive out 'low-end population' at one point, which created chaos," he said, referencing the term that officials in the capital used at the time.翻译:“北京曾一度试图驱逐‘低端人口’，结果造成了混乱，”他说，他指的是当时首都官员使用的这个词。

In Zhengzhou, Yang, the businessman, recalled how life was different before he obtained a city hukou.翻译:在郑州，商人杨回忆起他获得城市户口之前的生活是如何不同的。

He made a living operating an unlicensed mini-mart in a district of rural migrants, often sleeping on a straw mat in a park as he played hide-and-seek with the police.翻译:他在一个农民工聚集区经营一家无牌小超市谋生，经常睡在公园的草席上，与警察玩捉迷藏。

"They would organise big teams of volunteers and officers to knock on doors at night to flush out people without hukou," Yang said.翻译:杨说：“他们会组织志愿者和官员组成的大队，在夜间敲门，驱逐没有户口的人。”

Zhengzhou's government did not respond to Reuters queries.翻译:郑州市政府没有回应路透社的询问。

Once he had the permit, Yang's prospects soared.翻译:获得许可后，杨的前途一片光明。

In addition to expanding his business, he bought a second home - something only hukou holders could have - and his first car, a locally made Changan 50 minivan. He enjoyed a more active social life.翻译:除了扩大业务之外，他还购买了第二套住房（只有户口持有人才能拥有）和他的第一辆车，一辆本地制造的长安 50 小型货车。他享受着更加活跃的社交生活。

"Not many people could afford private vehicles at the time. Pretty girls would ask me to drive them around for some fun," Yang said. "And I did!"翻译:“当时买得起私家车的人不多，漂亮女孩都会叫我开着它们出去玩。”杨说。 “我做到了！”

item.title: 中国出口六个月来首次增长 工厂纾困
item.description:
China's exports grew for the first time in six months in November, suggesting factories in the world's second-largest economy are attracting buyers through discount pricing to get over a prolonged slump in demand.翻译:11月份，中国的出口出现六个月来的首次增长，这表明世界第二大经济体的工厂正在通过折扣价吸引买家，以克服长期的需求低迷。

Mixed manufacturing data for November has kept alive calls for further policy support to shore up growth but also raised questions about whether predominantly negative sentiment-based surveys have masked improvements in conditions.翻译:11 月份好坏参半的制造业数据引发了人们对进一步政策支持以提振增长的呼声，但也引发了人们的疑问：主要基于负面情绪的调查是否掩盖了状况的改善。

Exports grew 0.5% from a year earlier in November, customs data showed on Thursday, compared with a 6.4% fall in October and beating the 1.1% drop expected in a Reuters poll. Imports fell 0.6%, dashing forecasts for a 3.3% increase and swinging from a 3.0% jump last month.翻译:海关周四公布的数据显示，11 月份出口同比增长 0.5%，而 10 月份则下降 6.4%，超过了路透调查预期的 1.1% 降幅。进口下降 0.6%，远低于上个月增长 3.3% 的预期。

"The improvement in exports is broadly in line with market expectations... sequential growth in China's exports in the past few months has strengthened," said Zhiwei Zhang, chief economist at Pinpoint Asset Management. "There are green shoots in other Asian countries' export data as well in recent months."翻译:品点资产管理公司首席经济学家张志伟表示：“出口的改善基本符合市场预期……过去几个月中国出口的环比增长有所加强。” “近几个月来，其他亚洲国家的出口数据也出现了复苏。”

The Baltic Dry Index, a bellwether gauge of global trade, climbed to a three year high in November, supported by improved demand for industrial commodities, particularly from China.翻译:全球贸易的风向标波罗的海干散货运价指数在 11 月份攀升至三年来的高点，这得益于工业大宗商品需求的改善，尤其是来自中国的需求。

South Korean exports, another gauge of the health of global trade, rose for a second month in November, buoyed by chip exports, which snapped 15 months of declines.翻译:韩国出口是衡量全球贸易健康状况的另一个指标，在芯片出口的推动下，11 月份连续第二个月增长，芯片出口结束了 15 个月的下降。

Trade with China's major peers also painted a rosy picture, with exports to United States, Japan, South Korea and Taiwan all up on October.

DISCOUNTED EXPORTS

In the short run, however, the pressure on Chinese manufacturers show little sign of easing off completely.翻译:然而，短期来看，中国制造商面临的压力几乎没有完全缓解的迹象。

China's official purchasing managers' index (PMI) last week showed new export orders shrank for a ninth consecutive month, while a private sector survey highlighted the struggles of factory owners to attract overseas buyers for a fifth month.翻译:中国官方采购经理人指数（PMI）上周显示新出口订单连续第九个月萎缩，而私营部门调查则凸显工厂主连续第五个月难以吸引海外买家。

"While the level of export volumes hit a fresh high, (they were) supported by exporters reducing prices," noted Zichun Huang, China economist at Capital Economics.翻译:凯投宏观中国经济学家黄子春表示，“虽然出口量创出新高，但受到出口商降价的支撑。”

"We doubt this robustness will persist," Huang cautioned, "as exporters won't be able to continue cutting prices for much longer."翻译:黄警告说：“我们怀疑这种强劲势头能否持续，因为出口商将无法继续降价太长时间。”

Factory gate prices in the official PMI contracted for a second month in November, while input costs expanded for a fifth straight month.翻译:11 月份官方 PMI 中的工厂出厂价格连续第二个月收缩，而投入成本连续第五个月上涨。

Still, some analysts point to quicker-than-expected growth in the third quarter and a run of mostly upbeat data from October to argue that recent hard data paints a less gloomy picture of the economic health of the Asian giant than the sentiment-based surveys. The hard data also suggest the support measures trickling out of Beijing since June have had some effect, they say.翻译:尽管如此，一些分析师指出，第三季度的增长速度快于预期，而且10 月份以来的一系列基本乐观的数据表明，与基于情绪的调查相比，最近的硬数据描绘了这个亚洲巨人的经济健康状况。 。他们表示，硬数据还表明，自六月份以来北京出台的支持措施已经产生了一些效果。

"The data shows overseas demand is stronger than we thought and domestic demand is weaker than we thought," said Dan Wang, chief economist at Hang Seng Bank China. "The biggest export items are still electrical machinery and cars, so demand in Europe and Russia will have bolstered outbound shipments."

UNEVEN RECOVERY

Analysts say it is too early to tell whether the recent policy support will be enough to shore up domestic demand and how sustainable any uptick in overseas demand is, with property, unemployment and weak household and business confidence threatening a sustainable rebound at home.翻译:分析人士表示，现在判断近期的政策支持是否足以提振国内需求以及海外需求的增长能否持续还为时过早，因为房地产、失业以及疲软的家庭和企业信心威胁着国内经济的可持续反弹。

The International Monetary Fund in November upgraded its China growth forecasts for 2023 and 2024 by 0.4% percentage points each, but that came from a lower base. And Moody's on Tuesday slapped a downgrade warning on China's A1 credit rating.翻译:国际货币基金组织 (IMF) 11 月将中国 2023 年和 2024 年经济增长预测分别上调了 0.4 个百分点，但基数较低。穆迪周二对中国 A1 信用评级发出下调警告。

The Chinese markets seemed to reflect that cautiousness, with the yuan easing against the dollar after the data, while country's blue chip CSI300 stock index fell 0.44% and Hong Kong's Hang's Hang Seng lost 1.46%.翻译:中国市场似乎反映了这种谨慎态度，数据公布后人民币兑美元汇率下跌，而中国蓝筹股沪深300指数下跌0.44%，香港恒生指数下跌1.46%。

China's crude oil imports in November fell 9.2% year-on-year, the first annual decline since April as high inventory levels and poor manufacturing activity took their toll on demand for products such as diesel. But iron ore imports climbed slightly last month.翻译:11月份中国原油进口量同比下降9.2%，这是自4月份以来首次出现年度下降，原因是库存水平高和制造业活动不佳影响了柴油等产品的需求。但上个月铁矿石进口略有攀升。

"While export demand improved, it is unclear if exports can contribute as a growth pillar into next year," Pinpoint Asset Management's Zhang warned.翻译:品点资产管理公司的张警告说：“虽然出口需求有所改善，但目前尚不清楚出口能否成为明年的增长支柱。”

"The European and United States economies are cooling. China still needs to depend on domestic demand as the main driver for growth in 2024."翻译:“欧美经济正在降温，中国2024年仍需依靠内需作为增长主要动力。”

Reporting by Joe Cash Editing by Shri Navaratnam翻译:乔·卡什 (Joe Cash) 报道 Shri Navaratnam 编辑

item.title: 中国电子商务平台Temu吸引美元商店的购物者-数据
item.description:
Temu, the fast-growing Chinese e-commerce platform selling $4 home decor and $10 shirts, is successfully taking on U.S. dollar stores including industry leader Dollar General (DG.N), according to the latest market share data.翻译:根据最新的市场份额数据，快速发展的中国电子商务平台 Temu 正在成功与包括行业领导者 Dollar General (DG.N)在内的美元商店展开竞争，销售 4 美元的家居装饰品和 10 美元的衬衫。

As of last month, Temu accounted for nearly 17% of market share in the United States within the discount stores categories, according to data analytics firm Earnest Analytics. That compares to 8% for the dollar chain Five Below (FIVE.O), 43% for Dollar General (DG.N) and 28% for Dollar Tree.翻译:根据数据分析公司 Earnest Analytics 的数据，截至上个月，Temu 占据了美国折扣店类别近 17% 的市场份额。相比之下，美元链五以下(FIVE.O)为 8%，Dollar General (DG.N)为 43%，Dollar Tree 为 28%。

Temu launched in the United States in September 2022 and quickly became popular through its use of social-media influencers to tout its merchandise as better and more affordable than traditional stores.翻译:Temu 于 2022 年 9 月在美国推出，并通过利用社交媒体影响力宣传其商品比传统商店更好、更实惠而迅速走红。

"Its (Temu) low prices on household goods and consumer staples makes it more of a threat to brick-and-mortar discounters like the dollar stores than other online marketplaces," said Michael Maloof, head of marketing at Earnest Analytics.翻译:Earnest Analytics 营销主管迈克尔·马洛夫 (Michael Maloof) 表示：“Temu 的家居用品和消费品价格低廉，这使得它对一元店等实体折扣店的威胁比其他在线市场更大。”

Temu sells apparel including $12 dresses and $20 sneakers, while also offering similar holiday decor, storage containers and toys as dollar stores. Analysts expect it to generate more than $16 billion in revenue this year as it expands internationally.翻译:Temu 销售的服装包括 12 美元的连衣裙和 20 美元的运动鞋，同时还提供与一元店类似的节日装饰、储物容器和玩具。分析师预计，随着其国际扩张，该公司今年的收入将超过 160 亿美元。

"Temu has the advantage of novelty and excitement that is hard to re-create for staid low-end discount retail brands," said Michael Ashley Schulman, chief investment officer at Running Point Capital Advisors.翻译:Running Point Capital Advisors 首席投资官迈克尔·阿什利·舒尔曼 (Michael Ashley Schulman) 表示：“Temu 的优势在于新颖、令人兴奋，而这种优势是古板的低端折扣零售品牌难以复制的。”

Temu, Dollar General, Dollar Tree and Five Below did not respond to requests for comments on the research. The U.S. dollar stores have said previously they do not see an effect from Temu on their sales because of relatively smaller online presences and differing customers.翻译:Temu、Dollar General、Dollar Tree 和 Five Below 没有回应对该研究发表评论的请求。美元商店此前曾表示，由于在线业务规模相对较小且客户不同，他们认为 Temu 不会对其销售产生影响。

While dollar stores have maintained strength among customers buying necessities like food, beverages and items like detergent, they are dealing with a shift in consumer demand and also struggling with operational missteps.翻译:虽然一元店在购买食品、饮料和洗涤剂等必需品的消费者中保持着强劲势头，但它们正在应对消费者需求的转变，并在运营失误中苦苦挣扎。

Dollar General has cut its annual profit forecast three times this year as budget-conscious shoppers have cut spending on higher-margin discretionary goods and shifted to buying more lower-margin consumable goods.翻译:由于精打细算的购物者削减了利润率较高的非必需品支出，转而购买更多利润率较低的消费品，Dollar General 今年已三度下调年度利润预期。

Margins have also fallen at dollar stores because they are marking down merchandise to clear excess inventory and like many retailers are also being hurt by retail theft.翻译:一元店的利润率也下降了，因为它们对商品进行降价以清理多余的库存，而且像许多零售商一样，它们也受到零售盗窃的损害。

Tennessee-based Dollar General has seen the steepest decline in market share compared to competitors, according to Earnest Analytics. It held a 43% market share in November, down from about 57% in January. Dollar Tree's share slid nearly four percentage points from 32% in January to 28% in November.翻译:根据 Earnest Analytics 的数据，与竞争对手相比，田纳西州的 Dollar General 的市场份额下降幅度最大。 11 月份该公司的市场份额为 43%，低于 1 月份的 57% 左右。 Dollar Tree的份额从1月份的32%下降到11月份的28%，下降了近四个百分点。

Temu is benefiting from shopper fatigue with high prices and inflation, said Peter Earle, an economist at the American Institute for Economic Research, a libertarian, free-market think tank. Temu's parent company PDD Group (PDD.O) said revenue rose by 94% to 68.84 billion yuan ($9.62 billion) in the quarter ended Sept. 30 from a year ago.翻译:自由主义、自由市场智库美国经济研究所的经济学家彼得·厄尔表示，特姆正受益于高物价和通货膨胀带来的购物疲劳。 Temu 的母公司 PDD Group (PDD.O)表示，截至 9 月 30 日的季度收入较上年同期增长94%，达到 688.4 亿元人民币（96.2 亿美元）。

Temu uses a network of China-based manufacturers of cheap personal electronics, clothes and home goods. Factories and merchants on Temu send merchandise directly to Temu shoppers, using a trade exemption that allows shipments under $800 to enter the U.S. duty-free.翻译:Temu 利用中国廉价个人电子产品、服装和家居用品制造商的网络。 Temu 上的工厂和商家使用贸易豁免政策，将商品直接发送给 Temu 购物者，该贸易豁免允许 800 美元以下的货物免税进入美国。

"Temu with their 'shop like a billionaire' slogan has mastered gamification and rewards to make online shopping fun, easy, and cheaper than the dollar stores," Running Point's Schulman said.翻译:Running Point 的舒尔曼表示：“Temu 的口号是‘像亿万富翁一样购物’，他们已经掌握了游戏化和奖励机制，使在线购物变得有趣、轻松，而且比一元店更便宜。”

Reporting by Arriana McLymore in New York City and Granth Vanaik in Bengaluru; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:纽约市的 Ariana McLymore 和班加罗尔的 Granth Vanaik 的报道；杰米·弗里德编辑
